Title: Windows 8 Minesweeper
Description: A minesweeper clone in the Windows 8 Metro style, developed in JavaScript and HTML5.
HomeWiki:
Windows 8 Minesweeper
A minesweeper clone in the Windows 8 Metro style, developed in JavaScript and HTML5.

The Windows 8 Developer Preview is required to compile and run this application.

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/apps/br229516.aspx
